attributes.review: THIS APP TAKES YOUR INFO DONT DOWNLOAD IT. I downloaded this in an attempt to see what our president is about and he killed my turtle!! How did he know I had one?  100% DO NOT recommend. If I could give 0 stars I would give this app 0 stars!

attributes.review: This app is horrible. This app took me about 2-4 days to download and I have perfectly good WiFi were I live . I hate it and I do not recommend. When I opened the app I saw an orange man his face was so traumatizing.

attributes.review: hello im very upset because my fish was a big trump supporter. she / he (non binary) loved our racist and fascist president and my fish told me to download the app. i did and as soon as i did trump knocked on the door and took my fish for a walk. little did my fish know, you cant take fish on walks. my fish passed away and told me from the grave that trump is a terrible human being. so unless u want ur fish to die, dont download this app.
attributes.title: my fish died because of you
